columns.name: policy_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the appautoscaling policy.

columns.name: policy_name
columns.description: The name of the scaling policy.

columns.name: service_namespace
columns.description: The namespace of the AWS service that provides the resource, or a custom-resource.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The identifier of the resource associated with the scaling policy.

columns.name: scalable_dimension
columns.description: The scalable dimension associated with the scaling policy. This string consists of the service namespace, resource type, and scaling property.

columns.name: policy_type
columns.description: The policy type. Currently supported values are TargetTrackingScaling and StepScaling

columns.name: target_tracking_scaling_policy_configuration
columns.description: The target tracking scaling policy configuration (if policy type is TargetTrackingScaling).

columns.name: step_scaling_policy_configuration
columns.description: The step tracking scaling policy configuration (if policy type is StepScaling).

columns.name: alarms
columns.description: The CloudWatch alarms associated with the scaling policy.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The Unix timestamp for when the scaling policy was created.
